author: @burhan8795
text: Eddie I'm so glad I found your channel. I don't know if you need to hear this, but if you wanted know if you won your debate with destiny, only look at the end. Angry invectives are telltale signs of cognitive defeat. Kudos, bravo and I'll be tuning in from now on.

replies.author: @Frank-costanza
replies.text: I imagine they exist to take money from people who will pay them to have their prejudices put into a video. Then they can feel justified in keeping those prejudices. Otherwise Ben would have just been a failed screenwriter.
